snippet: A spokesman for Buckingham Palace said on Wednesday that the the prince, 90, had improved since he was hospitalized on Monday with a bladder infection.
abstract: Britain’s royal household says that Prince Philip, the husband of Queen Elizabeth II, has improved since he was hospitalized on June 4 with a bladder infection.
lead_paragraph: A spokesman for Buckingham Palace said on Wednesday that the the prince, 90, had improved since he was hospitalized on Monday with a bladder infection.

headline.seo: Britain’s Prince Philip Said to Have ‘Improved Considerably’ After Infection
headline.main: Britain’s Prince Philip Said to Have ‘Improved Considerably’ After Infection
